description:
Suzu decides to revenge on Shoko and Kei-o for Seishun.  Yoko senses someone’s after her and investigates Wa State.  Suzu tries to kill Kokan but is stopped by Kosho and his group, who turn out to have the same purpose of beating Shoko.  Shokei stops by Wa State’s capital, Meikaku, to witness a criminal being nailed.  That reminds her of her past and she throws a rock at a guard.  Yoko happens to be there and tries to save her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 10
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Juu Shou
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 10
風の万里 黎明の空 十章
